column4: has anyone noticed of their GNOME desktop starts a little faster with avahi-daemon configured and running?
is there a way to check fat32 systems?
you can check vfat certainly. i think you might need to install utilities to work with ntfs
i wouldn't. you should be able to find a browser plugin for jre
i install the packages you said and java still doesn't work
what does about:plugins show in firefox?
it might me some alternatives-related problem
sudo dpkg-reconfigure gcjwebplugin    nothing happens when i issue this command
